label.English: How many Six packs did you give ?
What type of Amoxicilin do you have in stock?
Does ${patient_name} have bleeding from nose, mouth, skin, other sites?
Assess the child's finger. Press on the finger for 5 seconds. Do the capilllaries refill quickly with blood? i.e less than 3 seconds
Did your child breastfeed in the last 24 hours
Is the child's immunization up to date?
How long has this cough lasted?
Is there blood in the diarrhoea?
How many episodes of watery diarrhoea stool has ${patient_name} had in the last 24hrs?
In the last 24 hours, how many times has your child eaten any solid or semi-solid foods?
How long has the fever lasted?
Does the pressing form an identation?
Is there paleness noted on the palm of the hands, under the eyelids and tongue?
Is the weakness due to an injury?
Did the mother breastfeed her child in the last 24 hours?
What is the child's MUAC score? (in colours)
Does the patient have a cough?
Sudden yellowness of eyes or skin
Has the patient been treated for malaria in the past two weeks?
Sudden loss of movement of one or both arms or legs
A worm emerging from the skin?
How long has the yellowness of eyes or skin lasted?
Check child health card and tick all that are complete. If health card not available, ask the caregiver to recall what immunisations are complete, if any
Check Mother and Child Health booklet and tick all that are complete. If health card not available, ask the caregiver to recall what immunisations are complete, if any
Check Mother and Child Health booklet and tick all that are complete. If health card not available, ask the caregiver to recall what immunisations are complete, if any
Click to see examples of positive and negative mRDT results.
Did your child eat any of the following protective and energy giving foods in the last 24 hours?
Proteins- beef, goat, pork, lamb, chicken, duck, fish, beans, peas, green grams.
Which Vit A dose has ${patient_name} received?

bind.calculate: if(count-selected(${danger_signs}) > 0, concat( if(selected(${danger_signs},'convulsions'), 'Convulsions, ',''), if(selected(${danger_signs},'unable_to_feed'), 'Unable to feed, ',''), if(selected(${danger_signs},'vomits_everything'), 'Vomits everything, ',''), if(selected(${danger_signs},'very_sleepy'), 'Very sleepy, ','') ), '')

if (${patient_coughs}='yes', if ( int(${coughing_duration}) > 14, if ( ${chest_indrawing}='yes' or ${fast_breathing}='true', 'pneumonia2c', 'cough2' ), if ( ${chest_indrawing}='yes' and ${fast_breathing}='true', 'pneumonia2b', if ( ${chest_indrawing}='yes', 'cough3', if ( ${fast_breathing}='true', 'pneumonia1', 'cough1' ) ) ) ), '' )

if(${patient_temperature} > 37.5, if(${fever_duration} <= 7, if(${mrdt_result} = 'positive', 'malaria2a', if(${treated_past_two_weeks} = 'yes', 'fever2b', 'fever2a' ) ), if(${mrdt_result} = 'positive', 'malaria2b', 'fever3' ) ), if(${mrdt_result} = 'positive', 'malaria1', if(${patient_fever} = 'yes', if(${treated_past_two_weeks} = 'yes', 'fever1a', if(${mrdt_result} = 'negative', if(${fever_duration} <= 7, 'fever1b1', 'fever1b2' ), 'fever1c' ) ), '' ) ) )

if((${breath_count}>=60) and (${patient_age_in_days}<14), ""true"", if((${breath_count}>=50) and (${patient_age_in_days}>=14) and (${patient_age_in_days}<365), ""true"", if((${breath_count}>=40) and (${patient_age_in_days}>=365) and (${patient_age_in_days}<(5*365.25)), ""true"", if((${breath_count}>=30) and (${patient_age_in_days}>=(5*365.25)), ""true"", ""false"" ))))

if(count-selected(${infant_danger_signs}) > 0, concat( if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_fever'), 'Fever, ',''), if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_fast_breathing'), 'Fast breathing, ',''), if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_indrawn_chest'), 'Chest in-drawing, ',''), if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_convulsions'), 'Convulsions, ',''), if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_infected_cord'), 'Infected umbilical cord, ',''), if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_diarrhea'), 'Diarrhea, ',''), if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_unable_to_feed'), 'Unable to breastfeed, ',''), if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_skin_pustules'), 'Many skin pustules, ',''), if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_vomits_everything'), 'Vomits everything, ',''), if(selected(${infant_danger_signs},'infant_very_sleepy'), 'Very sleepy, ','') ), '')

${syndrome_newborn_disease} != '' or ${syndrome_fever_rash} != '' or ${syndrome_fever} != '' or ${syndrome_yellowness_of_eyes_skin} != '' or ${syndrome_skin_worm} != '' or ${syndrome_animal_bite} != '' or ${syndrome_watery_diarrhoea} != '' or ${syndrome_chest_illness} != '' or ${syndrome_weakness} != ''

concat( concat(${patient_age_in_years}, if(${patient_age_in_years}=1,' year and ',' years and ')), concat(${patient_age_in_months} mod 12, if((${patient_age_in_months} mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')) )

if (${referral_follow_up} = 'true', 'Follow up in 1 day to ensure that patient goes to a health facility', if (${treatment_follow_up} = 'true', 'Follow up in 2 days to see if there is improvement with treatment', '' ) )

if (${diagnosis_cough}='cough2' or (${diagnosis_cough}='cough3' and ${patient_age_in_years} < 5) or (${diagnosis_cough}='pneumonia2b' and ${patient_age_in_years} < 5) or ${diagnosis_cough}='pneumonia2c' or (${diagnosis_diarrhea}='diarrhea1' and ${patient_age_in_years} >= 5) or ${diagnosis_diarrhea}='diarrhea2' or (${diagnosis_fever}='malaria1' and ${patient_age_in_months} < 4) or (${diagnosis_fever}='fever2b' and ${patient_age_in_years} < 3) or (${diagnosis_fever}='malaria2a' and ${patient_age_in_months} < 4) or ${diagnosis_fever}='malaria2b' or ${diagnosis_fever}='fever3' or count-selected(${danger_signs}) > 0 or ${patient_age_in_months} < 2 or ${is_referral} = 'true', 'true', 'false' )

concat( if(${syndrome_newborn_disease} != '', 'Newborn Disease,', ''), if(${syndrome_fever} != '', 'Body Hotness (Fever),', ''), if(${syndrome_fever_rash} != '', 'Body Hotness and Rash', ''), if(${syndrome_fever_bleeding} != '', 'Body Hotness and bleeding,', ''), if(${syndrome_fever_painful_swelling} != '', 'Body Hotness and Painful Swelling,', ''), if(${syndrome_yellowness_of_eyes_skin} != '', 'Sudden Yellowness of eyes or skin,', ''), if(${syndrome_skin_worm} != '', 'Skin Worm,', ''), if(${syndrome_animal_bite} != '', 'Animal bite,', ''), if(${syndrome_watery_diarrhoea} != '', 'Lots of watery diarrhoea,', ''), if(${syndrome_chest_illness} != '', 'Severe Chest Illness,', ''), if(${syndrome_weakness} != '', 'Sudden weakness or loss of movement of arms or legs,', ''),if(${syndrome_aefi} != '', 'AEFI,', '') )
if (${patient_coughs}='yes', concat ( 'Cough', if( string-length(${coughing_duration}) != 0, concat ( ' for ', jr:choice-name(${coughing_duration}, '${coughing_duration}') ), '' ) ), '' )

if (${patient_diarrhea}='yes', concat( 'Diarrhoea', if( string-length(${diarrhea_duration}) != 0, concat ( ' for ', jr:choice-name(${diarrhea_duration}, '${diarrhea_duration}') ), '' ), if (${diarrhea_blood}='yes', ' with blood', '') ), '' )

if ((${patient_temperature} > 37.5 or ${patient_fever} = 'yes'), concat ( 'Fever', if( string-length(${fever_duration}) != 0, concat ( ' for ', jr:choice-name(${fever_duration}, '${fever_duration}') ), '' ) ), '' )
if(${patient_fever} = 'yes' and ${painful_swelling} = 'yes', 'Body hotness (Fever) with painful groin swelling', '')
if(${patient_diarrhea} = 'yes' and (${diarrhea_episodes}  >= 3 or  ${diarrhea_blood} = 'yes'), 'Lots of watery diarrhoea', '')
if(${weakness} = 'yes' and ${injury_related} = 'no', 'Sudden weakness or loss of movement of arms or legs','')
if(${skin_yellowness} = 'yes' and ${yellowness_duration} <2, 'Sudden yellowness of eyes or skin', '')

if ( ${diagnosis_cough}='cough1' or (${diagnosis_cough}='cough3' and ${patient_age_in_years} >= 5) or ${diagnosis_cough}='pneumonia1' or (${diagnosis_cough} = 'pneumonia2b' and ${patient_age_in_years} >= 5) or ${diagnosis_diarrhea}='diarrhea1' or (${diagnosis_fever}='malaria1' and ${patient_age_in_months} >= 4) or ${diagnosis_fever}='fever2a' or ${diagnosis_fever}='fever2b' or (${diagnosis_fever}='malaria2a' and ${patient_age_in_months} >= 4), 'true', 'false' )
